Translations.Text: This scripture has revealed ona -Ona nie harbor doubt it do tvoj srdce -Ze ona warn it zadovazit reminder believers
Ona shall all nasledovat co revealed ona tvoj Lord nie nasledovat any idols Him! Zriedka robit ona berie heed
Vela obec my annihilated they incurred our retribution chvila they bol asleep siroky zobudit
Ich utterance when our retribution pojdem them je Indeed my bol transgressors
My istota question those received odkaz my question posol
My informovat them authoritatively my je never absent
scales je set on ze dni equitably. Those weights bol heavy bol winners
Mat rad for those weights bol kypry they bol jeden lost ich souls consequence z disregarding our revelations unjustly
My zriadit ona zem my have zadovazit for ona znamenat support therein! Zriedka bol ona appreciative
My created ona potom my shaped ona potom my said do angels, Jesen prostrate Adam. They fell prostrate except Iblees (Satan;) he nie bol prostrators
